title: He's Like My Girlfriend ( Gillie Da King and Wallo)
itunes:title: He's Like My Girlfriend ( Gillie Da King and Wallo)
description:
Today on the show we had friends to the room, Gillie Da King and Wallo stop by where they spoke about about their podcast, debating on who's a better rapper in the industry, old record deals and so much more. And you know whenever they come you are definitely going to get some laughs in! Also, Charlamagne gave a well deserved "Donkey of the Day" to the murderer Robert Aaron Long who went on a killing spree and another hee- haw to Captain Jay Baker for justifying the crime by claiming "he had a bad day". Also, Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Also, Charlamagne gave a well deserved "Donkey of the Day" to the murderer Robert Aaron Long who went on a killing spree and another hee- haw to Captain Jay Baker for justifying the crime by claiming "he had a bad day".
